title: How do I push for pixel 2xl butterfly iq compatibility? They rolled it out for the pixel 3 and 4.
content: I would like the butterfly iq ultrasound to be compatible with pixel 2xl. I have written the butterfly company as well. It is compatible with the pixel 3 and 4 but not the 2 for some reason.  Not sure how I can encourage Google to push for this compatibility.
